jumbotron.jumbotronSubtitle: I'm a passionate fullstack javascript developer and product manager based out of Stockholm, Sweden.

aboutMe.aboutMeParagraph1: I am full stack Javascript developer and product manager who has worked in both LegalTech and Fintech within the Stockholm ecosystem.
aboutMe.aboutMeParagraph2: Driven by process with a keen eye on the big picture, I strive to constantly optimise my work and the work of the teams I manage to fulfil product objectives.
aboutMe.aboutMeParagraph3: I have launched multiple products by ensuring productive cross-functional team collaboration and encouraging communication within an agile framework.
aboutMe.aboutMeParagraph4: I am also a passionate skier, a skateboarder and when I am not outside in the wilderness, I spend my time developing websites and apps.

projects.title: My projects
projects.subtitle: Here are just a few of the apps I have worked on in the recent past.
projects.project1: A Reminders app allowing users to add, edit and collaborate on tasks in realtime. Built with ReactJS, Typescript, Socket.io and Beautiful dnd on the client side and ExpressJS, Typescript, Socket.io and MongoDB on the server side.
projects.project2: An app to receive updates on the main world currencies including the main cryptocurrencies. Built with ReactJS, ExpressJS and MongoDB and deployed on Github pages (client side) and Heroku (server side).
projects.project3: An app for parents in France to be able to rent second hand baby clothes during the first months of their babies lives. This circular economy app is built in ReactJS, Typescript on the client side and ExpressJS, MongoDB and Typescript on the server side.
projects.project4: An app where users can trade items with each other. Made in 9 days, this full-stack application includes user sign-up and authentication, an interface for creating new items and uploading images, as well a matching feature which informs the users of mutual trading interests.

skills.skillsSubtitle: Through many years of experience in business management, product management and web development, I have developed key skills during my career.

skillCards.title: Product Management
skillCards.text: By constantly optimising internal processes and striving for a big picture of the product and its objectives, I manage my products by having a clear overview of all the moving pieces in order to maintain agility and speed to market.

skillCards.title: Full Stack development
skillCards.text: From SQL or Mongo DB databases to websites like this one built in Svelte, I can build full stack applications in javascript to bring best practice solutions to businesses and entrepreneurs.

skillCards.title: UX/UI and web design
skillCards.text: With a keen interest in human psychology and its effects on UX and a strong belief in user centered design, I push to implement clean and efficient design in my products, based on a fine balance between intuition, innovation and user feedback.

experiences.title: Full-stack Javascript Developer
experiences.caption: Jan 2021 - Present
experiences.content: I am currently working as a full stack javascript developer for Salt in Stockholm. From front ends in ReactJS to databases in Mongo DB, I bring all my experience of product management and UX/UI to all my new projects.

experiences.title: Digital Product Manager
experiences.caption: Jan 2020 - Dec 2020
experiences.content: As Product manager for Betao's User System/ invoicing tool, I was the bridge between the company's strategic vision and the two main products we created. I was responsible for identifying market needs and competitive opportunities while defining the product strategies, feature roadmaps and enhancing customer experience.

experiences.title: Digital Product Manager
experiences.caption: Feb 2019 - Jan 2020
experiences.content: As a Product Manager for Simplitoo, I was responsible for analysing the market and competitive environment in order to define a clear product vision and growth strategy. In this role I got to move the company to a more user focused organisation, build consensus amongst stakeholders and further develop my technical knowledge in software engineering.

experiences.title: Project Manager
experiences.caption: Jun 2017 - Feb 2019
experiences.content: As a Project Manager I led a cross-functional team to the successful launch of Betao‚Äôs online solution to help entrepreneurs create their capital companies in France. During this project I introduced agile methodology and lean product development to the company with a view to accessing user orientated business opportunities enhancing productivity.
